name: Lotan
description:
The Fish-God must be Slain!

Behold, the great flood of a thousand years

It dredges up deep creatures pale like bone

When white lightning strikes twice, the Fish-God’s tears

Turn red with blood and mix amongst the foam

Explore an ocean of death and despair, as you hunt an ancient godbeast of chaos. Create order and calm the waves, and let the cycle being anew.

Entry for Fishing Horror Jam 2020

---

Controls:

  • Move around - WASD
  • Throw Harpoon - Left Mouse Button or Space bar (hold to throw further)
  • Board Ship - E key
  • Pause Game - ESC key (hold to Quit Game)
